sourcesContent:
export const Users = ({users}) =>{ if(users.length === 0)return null const UserRow = (user, index) => { return ( {index+1} {user.firstname} {user.lastname} {user.begindate} {user.enddate} {user.hours} ) } const userTable = users.map((user,index) => UserRow(user,index)) return(

Users

{userTable}
User Id Firstname Lastname begin date end date hours
) }
